title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

Must identify both regions with data ranges for one point.

One point is earned for a correct two-part identification.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

Each description must move beyond a simple word or phrase to receive point.

Two points are earned for two correct descriptions.
descriptions: The response correctly does one of the following:
The response correctly does two of the following:

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

Explanation must match identifications.

Four points are earned for two correct identifications and two correct explanations.
descriptions: The response does not do any of the following:
The response correctly does one of the following:
The response correctly does two of the following:
The response correctly does three of the following:
The response correctly does four of the following:
